entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Chelsea
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:25 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 2.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 12:00 AM EST Wednesday 04 January 2023
Temperature: 2.1°C
Pressure: 101.1 kPa
Humidity: 80 %
Dewpoint: -1.0°C
Wind: NNE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Snow beginning overnight. Risk of freezing rain along the Ottawa River overnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain along the Ottawa River early in the morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 7. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 5.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow at times heavy or ice pellets beginning in the evening. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.summary: Periods of snow. High minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
